item.description: Have you ever wanted to become more active and maybe lose a few pounds in the process? Beginning just after the first of the new year, let's make that resolution come true with a proven, gradual walk to jog program that will have you running your first 5K race in just a couple of months. This meet-up's details will be updated as we get closer to New Year's, but I wanted to get this announced to see if there was enough interest to move forward.  I am working on recruiting a coach so there might be a nominal charge, but it would be no more than $25 per person for a several week long program that would get you ready for your first (or next) 5K race.
item.name: New Year's Resolution: Couch to 5K
